data.title: A Lowland Cinderella (1922)
data.meta_description: A retelling of Cinderella in 1920s Britain.
data.text:
Watched this at the Ropetackle Theater in Shoreham-By-Sea, via a print loaned from the archive at the University of Sussex.

Before the film began, a short film played detailing the history of Shoreham's various cinemas. Equal parts inspiring (old photographs of films shot in streets I've walked down) and depressing (one of the former cinemas is a Dominos, the other a Co-op, and so on), it made me incredibly grateful for venues like the Ropetackle. The place was packed, which was very cheering to see.

This is probably the best possible way to see the film, and like all things that have weathered the last hundred years, it didn't look pristine. But what I did find quite moving was theâ€¦
